name: Garden of Beeden
description:
The bee species on earth has nearly gone extinct, and they deserve better. A brave team of scientists banded together with an idea to save the bee race: send them into space. New planets are abound, teeming with conditions for the bees to live the lives they deserve. But can they make it with only a small budget for space travel?

This is the search for…

THE GARDEN OF BEEDEN

Controls:

Interact with the buttons and sliders to turn the red lights into green lights!
